channel.title: Weird 508 Bounty Hunter interface problem!?
channel.description:
Well, I'm making bounty hunter. Yeah. Anyways, I got the penalty working, so now I'm trying to make the penalty actually show on that little box. But everytime I attempt to do this, it doesnt work.
It says I have a penalty: [img]http://i272.photobucket.com/albums/jj189/bawt_bucket/bh2.jpg[/img]
But it doesn't show: [img]http://i272.photobucket.com/albums/jj189/bawt_bucket/bh.jpg[/img]
Here's my code:
[code]p.getActionSender().setOverlay(p, 653); p.getActionSender().setInterfaceConfig(p, 653, 9, true); p.getActionSender().setString(this, "Can't leave for:", 653, 9); p.getActionSender().setString(this, "" + BhTimer, 653, 10);[/code]

item.title: Weird 508 Bounty Hunter interface problem!?
item.dc:creator: @bfghu8 bfghu8
item.description:
@bfghu8 wrote:

I’m using Z508, and reshowing the interface doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird 508 Bounty Hunter interface problem!?
item.dc:creator: @bfghu8 bfghu8
item.description:
@bfghu8 wrote:

Well, I’m making bounty hunter. Yeah.
Anyways, I got the penalty working, so now I’m trying to make the penalty actually show on that little box.
But everytime I attempt to do this, it doesnt work.

It says I have a penalty:

But it doesn’t show:

Here’s my code:

p.getActionSender().setOverlay(p, 653); p.getActionSender().setInterfaceConfig(p, 653, 9, true); p.getActionSender().setString(this, "Can't leave for:", 653, 9); p.getActionSender().setString(this, "" + BhTimer, 653, 10);
